trans-unit.source: Manage your Azure MFA settings in the Office 365 portal
trans-unit.target: Manage your Azure MFA settings in the Office 365 portal

trans-unit.source: This page will show users where in the Office 365 portal they need to go to manage their Azure MFA settings.
trans-unit.target: This page will show users where in the Office 365 portal they need to go to manage their Azure MFA settings.

trans-unit.source: Manage your Azure Multi-Factor Authentication settings in the Office 365 portal
trans-unit.target: Manage your Azure Multi-Factor Authentication settings in the Office 365 portal

trans-unit.source: If you use multi-factor authentication with Office 365 you will want to manage your additional security verification settings through the Office 365 portal.
trans-unit.target: If you use multi-factor authentication with Office 365 you will want to manage your additional security verification settings through the Office 365 portal.

trans-unit.source: To access additional security verification settings in the Office 365 portal
trans-unit.target: To access additional security verification settings in the Office 365 portal

trans-unit.source: <html></html>At the top, click the icon that looks like a little cog.This will display a drop-down that says Office 365 settings.<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>At the top, click the icon that looks like a little cog.This will display a drop-down that says Office 365 settings.<html></html>

trans-unit.source: <html></html>Click on the Office 365, settings.This will open the settings page.<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>Click on the Office 365, settings.This will open the settings page.<html></html>

trans-unit.source: <html></html>On the left, click additional security verification.<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>On the left, click additional security verification.<html></html>

trans-unit.source: <html></html>On the right, click the link that says Update my phone numbers used for account security.This will redirect you to a new page.You will have to verify how you are again using either your phone or the mobile app<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>On the right, click the link that says Update my phone numbers used for account security.This will redirect you to a new page.You will have to verify how you are again using either your phone or the mobile app<html></html>

trans-unit.source: <html></html>Once this completes you should be on the proof-up page and you can change your settings.<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>Once this completes you should be on the proof-up page and you can change your settings.<html></html>
